name: Battle Bruise - Beta testing
description:
Pile bodies on your way!


Stay atop the mountains of corpses and face really numerous waves of enemies!

Atop a mountain of corpses, you will fight numerous swarms of enemies, while dealing with the changing terrain. Explosions will create holes, while pile of corpses will form little mountains.

This game isn't messy. It's MESS ITSELF!

------------------------------------------------------------

Beta testing version: Every mess needs some order, to keep things right. Your feedback is of ultimately importance to help the chaos to fit on a nice game shape.
